Gatekeeper Ziggurat: As I said, go into the sacred area, slay the guardians of ancient cult and bring back the Scroll of Ancient Magic. Then I will remove the magic power from the scroll and give you a Blank Scroll as a reward. That is the only reward I can give you. A Blank Scroll will also be helpful to you if you trade with the Merchant of Mammon who appears in the sacred area every once in a while.
